attributes.action: Honour Wendy Craig, a wonderful actress and good person
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wendy Craig deserves an honour for the roles she has performed over the years, sometimes poignant, sometimes hilarious, always well crafted. Her deep faith shines through her.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
